library(sf)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggspatial)
library(ggthemes)

public <- st_read("https://services5.arcgis.com/GfwWNkhOj9bNBqoJ/arcgis/rest/services/Privately_Owned_Public_Spaces/FeatureServer/0/query?where=1=1&outFields=*&outSR=4326&f=pgeojson")

nhoods <- st_read("https://services5.arcgis.com/GfwWNkhOj9bNBqoJ/arcgis/rest/services/NYC_Neighborhood_Tabulation_Areas_2020/FeatureServer/0/query?where=1=1&outFields=*&outSR=4326&f=pgeojson")

health <- st_read("https://services5.arcgis.com/GfwWNkhOj9bNBqoJ/arcgis/rest/services/NYC_Health_Centers/FeatureServer/0/query?where=1=1&outFields=*&outSR=4326&f=pgeojson")



public_plot <- ggplot(nhoods) +
geom_sf() +
geom_sf(alpha = 0.5)

public_plot

nhoods_plot <- ggplot(nhoods) +
geom_sf() +
geom_sf(alpha = 0.3)

public_plot <- ggplot(public) +
geom_sf() + 
geom_sf(color = "blue")

public_plot

public2_plot <-ggplot(public) + 
geom_sf() +
geom_sf(color = "blue")

public2_plot

nhoods_plot + 
geom_sf() +
geom_sf(data = public, color = "blue", alpha = 0.5, shape = 1)

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = nhoods, color = "gray", 
                           size = 1,
                           fill = "black",
                           alpha = 0.5) +
  geom_sf(data = public, color = "blue")
  
layer1_map <-ggplot() +
geom_sf(data = nhoods, color = "gray", size = 1, fill = "black", alpha = 0.5) + geom_sf(data = public, shape = 15, color = "blue", alpha = 0.6)

layer1_map

nhoods2_plot <-ggplot() + 
geom_sf(data = nhoods, color = "gray", size = 0.5, fill = "black", alpha = 0.5)

nhoods2_plot

nhoods2_plot +
geom_sf(data = public, color  = "blue", shape = 15, alpha = 0.7)

ggplot() + 
geom_sf(data = nhoods, color = "gray", size = 0.3, fill = "black", alpha = 0.5, aes(fill = "NYC Neighborhoods")) +
geom_sf(data = public, color  = "blue", shape = 15, alpha = 0.9) +
scale_fill_manual(values = "gray", name = "")

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = nhoods, color = "gray", alpha = 0.5, size = 0.3
          aes(fill = "NYC Neighborhoods")) +
  geom_sf(data = public, color = "blue") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = "gray", name = "")
  
ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = nhoods, color = "NA", alpha = 0.5
          aes(fill = "NYC Neighborhoods")) +
  geom_sf(data = public, color = "blue") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = "black", name = "")


ggplot() +
  geom_sf(aes(color = "Playground")) +
  geom_sf(data = gardens, aes(color = "Community Garden")) +
  geom_sf(data = historic, aes(fill = "Historic District"), alpha = 0.25, color = NA) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = "goldenrod4", name = "") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("gold", "forestgreen"), name = "") +
  theme(panel.background = element_rect(fill = "white"),
        legend.key = element_rect(fill = "white"))
        
        
ggplot(health) +
  annotation_map_tile(zoomin = 0, progress = "none") +
  geom_sf() +
  labs(caption = "Map tiles and data by OpenStreetMap")

ggplot(public) +
  annotation_map_tile(zoomin = 0, progress = "none", type = "hotstyle")  +
  geom_sf() +
  labs(caption = "Map tiles and data by OpenStreetMap")

ggplot() +
  geom_sf(data = nhoods, color = "NA", alpha = 0.5,
          aes(fill = "NYC Neighborhoods")) +
  geom_sf(data = public, color = "blue") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = "black", name = "")

```{r}  
ggplot() +
  ggtitle("NYC Neighborhoods") +
  annotation_map_tile(zoomin = 0, progress = "none", type = "cartolight") +
  geom_sf(data = nhoods, color = "white", alpha = 0.5,
          aes(fill = "NYC Neighborhoods")) +
  geom_sf(data = public,
         aes(color = "Privately Owned Public Spaces")) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = "black", name = "") +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("blue"), name = "") +
  labs(caption = "Privately Owned Public Spaces in New York City")
```
